channel.title: Natural Colors Part 3 (and counting)
channel.description: Two rolls of TXP 220, Xtol 1+1. Joerg (via Mark) finds the great links again: Laurence Demaison's B&W works are as unlike the typical wannabe-Weston or faux-HCB Leica-foto fare as you're likely to find. And quite devoid of anything...
